title: I haven’t studied anything. I have only 4 months left in the 12th boards. Can I score above 90%? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think i am the right person to answer you regarding the above questiom as i own had this doubt when i was in 12 grade Yes you can definately score above 90% if still 4 months are left for the examination.But for this you will have to focus only on study. Purchase chapterwise( previous year question) of arihant or exam idea publication and read and solve them by heart.
Yes you can!!! Just purchase previous 5 yr question bank and solve them and read the book properly... You will be sorted and will be able to score more than 90% Best of luck
